testcase.name: get_User_API_Schema_Test

failure.message:
1 expectation failed. Response body doesn't match expectation. Expected: The content to match the given JSON schema. error: instance type (integer) does not match any allowed primitive type (allowed: ["null"]) level: "error" schema: {"loadingURI":"file:/D:/JavaXps/RESTAssuredAPI/target/test-classes/getUsersSchema.json#","pointer":"/items/0/properties/id"} instance: {"pointer":"/0/id"} domain: "validation" keyword: "type" found: "integer" expected: ["null"]
Actual: [{"id":2794,"name":"Purushottam Johar","email":"purushottam_johar@harris-mann.net","gender":"male","status":"inactive"},{"id":2050,"name":"Gov. Purushottam Mehra","email":"mehra_purushottam_gov@rice.org","gender":"male","status":"inactive"},{"id":1870,"name":"Shobhana Naik Sr.","email":"sr_naik_shobhana@tillman.co","gender":"male","status":"inactive"},{"id":374,"name":"Shobhana Bandopadhyay III","email":"bandopadhyay_shobhana_iii@corkery.name","gender":"male","status":"inactive"},{"id":316,"name":"Purushottam Bhattacharya","email":"bhattacharya_purushottam@morar.co","gender":"male","status":"active"},{"id":121,"name":"Shobhana Khatri","email":"shobhana_khatri@jacobson.name","gender":"male","status":"inactive"}]
